name: Depth of Extinction Classic
description:
The original demo released in 2016 for Depth of Extinction. We are making this available again for those that are curious about the origin of the game and want to give it a try. 

It's quite a bit different from the full game and is best appreciated as a completely separate and much less polished experience.

Key Features:

  • Level up your team with 5 different character classes and 6 different weapon classes!
  • Fight off hoards of android invaders in 5 different levels
  • Fun and engaging turn based battles (if a little slow and clunky at times)

Some reviews of the demo from 2016:

Retro Nuke
It’s a darn good demo. It could honestly work as a full game the way it is now... Strategy fans will complete the six hour demo in no time as they plan and destroy squads of robots, and novice strategy gamers will pick up on the gameplay quite easily. Hardlockup
Early impressions are very promising. I like the overall feel of the game.  New Retro Gamer
After playing through a few battles, though, I found myself playing “just one more”. Just to grab that nice assault weapon upgrade, or that operative class upgrade.. ooh, wait, this battle will reward an additional team slot… Ok, one more..just one more, promise.

The final version of the game is available on many platforms:

  • Windows/Mac and Linux on Steam, GOG and itch.io
  • Nintendo Switch
  • XBOX one
  • PlayStation 4

Donating or downloading does not get you a key to the full game on itch or Steam.
